title: 20 em 1 (Brazil)
plot: 20 em 1 is a collection of 20 games for the Sega Master System console, released exclusively in Brazil. The collection includes a variety of popular titles, such as Sonic the Hedgehog, Alex Kidd, and Wonder Boy.

title: 4 PAK All Action (Australia) (Unl)
plot: 4 PAK All Action is a collection of four classic Sega Master System games, including California Games, World Grand Prix, Pro Wrestling, and Out Run. The collection was released in Australia as an unlicensed game cartridge.

title: 94 Super World Cup Soccer (Korea)
plot: 94 Super World Cup Soccer is a soccer video game for the Sega Master System console, released exclusively in Korea. The game features several international teams and allows players to compete in a variety of soccer tournaments.

title: Ace of Aces (Europe)
plot: Ace of Aces is a flight simulation game for the Sega Master System console, originally developed and published by Artech Digital Entertainment for various other platforms. The game puts players in the cockpit of a World War II fighter plane and allows them to engage in dogfights and other aerial combat missions.

title: Action Fighter (Japan, Europe) (Rev 1)
plot: Action Fighter is a vehicular combat game for the Sega Master System console. Players control a motorcycle that can transform into a fighter plane, and must navigate through a variety of levels while fighting off enemy vehicles and bosses.

plot: Action Fighter is a vehicular combat game for the Sega Master System console. Players control a motorcycle that can transform into a fighter plane, and must navigate through a variety of levels while fighting off enemy vehicles and bosses.

title: Aerial Assault (Europe)
plot: Aerial Assault is a side-scrolling shooter game for the Sega Master System console. Players control a fighter plane as they engage in aerial combat against enemy forces.
